page.title: 05 MAY FAIR
page.content: IN WINTERSLOW FOR AT LEAST A HUNDRED YEARS THERE HAS BEEN A YEARLY EVENT. THIS WAS NORMALLY A CARNIVAL OR A BIG BRING AND BUY SALE.IT WAS HELD IN THE SCHOOL HALL,OR IN THE RECREATION GROUND ACROSS THE ROAD FROM THE SCHOOL.THIS STOPPED ABOUT 19 YEARS AGO. SOON THEY DECIDED THAT THEY NEEDED A CARNIVAL OF SOME SORT SO THEY PUT BOTH THE CARNIVAL AND BRING AND BUY TOGETHER. THEY MADE IT INTO A MAY FAIR. AT THE MAY FAIR THEY HAVE LOTS OF FUN AND GAMES. THE SCHOOL CHOOSES A MAY QUEEN FROM THE TOP CLASS.THIS YEAR IT WAS TRACY WOOLLEY.THE MAY FAIR NORMALLY HAS 8 TO 10 FLOATS. ALSO LOTS OF WALKERS.THE MAY FAIR IS ALSO A GREAT SUCCESS.
